mapper.insert: insert into ARK2_review(num, gdsthumbimg, title, content, gdsImg, writer) values (seq_review.nextval, #{gdsthumbimg}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gdsImg}, #{writer})
mapper.update:
update ARK2_review set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, ttdate = sysdate, gdsthumbimg=#{gdsthumbimg}
where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select num , title, content, writer, ttdate, count, gdsthumbimg from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(ARK2_review pk_ARK_review)*/ rownum rn, num, title, content, writer, ttdate,count,gdsthumbimg from ARK2_review where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select count(num) from ARK2_review where num > 0
mapper.insert: insert into ARK2_reply (num, userId, repNum, repCon) values (#{num}, #{userId}, seq_ARK2_reply.nextval, #{repCon})
mapper.select: select r.num, r.userId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, r.userid ,m.name as userName from ARK2_reply r inner join ark_newmember2 m on r.userId = m.id where num = #{num}
mapper.update: update ARK2_review set replycnt=replycnt+#{amount} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
